snippet: The contract security guard also managed to take pictures during the encounter, an official said, violating Secret Service rules while the president was in Atlanta.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

lead_paragraph: The contract security guard also managed to take pictures during the encounter, an official said, violating Secret Service rules while the president was in Atlanta.

headline.seo: Secret Service Rules Violated on Obama's Trip to Atlanta
headline.main: Armed Outside Guard Was Allowed on Elevator With President, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Armed Outside Guard Was Allowed on Elevator With Obama, Officials Say
